entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as one of those who could no longer work. He is referred to by name and is a member of the Weasley family.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as one of those who could no longer work. He is referred to by name and is a member of the Weasley family.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is mentioned as someone who could no longer work. He is referred to by title and last name.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is mentioned as the one being spoken to by Mr. Weasley. She is a witch and is helping with dinner preparation.

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook is mentioned as someone who needs meat for dinner. He is referred to by name and is a goblin.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as someone who prefers his meat bloody. He is referred to by name and is a member of the Weasley family.

entities.name: greyback
entities.description: Greyback is mentioned as the one who attacked Bill. He is referred to by name and is a werewolf.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who saved Fleur's sister's life. He is referred to by name and is a member of the Weasley family.

entities.name: gabrielle
entities.description: Gabrielle is mentioned as Fleur's sister. She is referred to by name and is a person.

entities.name: mr ollivander
entities.description: Mr. Ollivander is mentioned as someone who leaves Shell Cottage for Muriel's evening. He is referred to by title and last name.

entities.name: muriel
entities.description: Muriel is mentioned as the one whose evening Mr. Ollivander is leaving for. She is referred to by name and is a person.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who can take a room upstairs. He is referred to by name and is a member of the Weasley family.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean is mentioned as someone who can take a room upstairs. He is referred to by name and is a person.

relationships.description: Harry saved Fleur's sister's life, according to the text.
Mr. Ollivander leaves Shell Cottage for Muriel's evening.
